title: Astronaut Twins To Separate For The Sake Of Space Travel
teaser: Astronaut Scott Kelly has arrived at the International Space Station on a yearlong mission. He and Mark Kelly, his twin and fellow NASA astronaut, will take part in experiments comparing their health.
contentencoded:
This segment originally aired on April 27, 2014.
